titleStmt.title: Tuba stentoro-phonica an instrument of excellent use as well at sea as at land / invented ... in the year 1670 and humbly presented to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty Charles II in the year 1671 by S. Morland.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: portrait lacking. Page 12 blurred and p. 14 creased with some loss of print. Title card on film erroneosly attributes book to the Huntington Library.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
